extension.summary: Main resolvers, useful for converting html/js into playable content from various hosts (Greek ones).
extension.description: Main resolvers, useful for converting html/js into playable content from various hosts (Greek ones).
extension.news:
Version 0.0.14(June 9, 2021) - Remove highstream - Mitigate ert plugin by adding referer to the headers
Version 0.0.13(April 16, 2021) - Remove userload & wolfstream as they are not working
Version 0.0.9 - 0.0.12 (April 16, 2021) - Improve userload plugin - Add wolfstream.tv (until it gets merged upstream)
Version 0.0.8 (April 14, 2021) - Add userload (until it gets merged upstream)
Version 0.0.7 (April 11, 2021) - Add highstream.tv (until it gets merged upstream)
Version 0.0.6 (April 05, 2021) - Update skai - Add mega - Removed euronews
